scripts.build: tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs && pnpx shx cp dist/main.bundle.js dist/main.js && pnpx shx cp ./src/index.html ./dist && pnpx shx cp ./src/splash.html ./dist
scripts.clean: pnpm clean:dist && pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./node_modules ./wdio-logs
scripts.clean:dist: pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./dist && pnpm dlx shx mkdir -p ./dist
